title: Attempting To Reconnect Every 2-3 Minutes
body: I have been experiencing some problems with League Of Legends. Every 2-3 minutes, it freezes and says attempting to reconnect. There is nothing wrong with my Computer or my internet. ive asked a few of my friends and they also have the same problem. How can we fix this? Riot?

replies.body:
Good luck getting a red here.

Anyway, what OS are you on?
